[![](https://sansabatexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/election.jpg)](https://www.votetexas.gov/)

**WELCOME TO THE ELECTION INFORMATION HUB. ALL NOTICES SINCE 2025 ARE HOUSED HERE.**

Notice of 2026 Notice of Deadline to File to Application for Place on Ballot.
[Learn more](https://sansabatexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/12/2026-Notice-of-Deadline-to-File-Application.pdf)

….

Notice of 2026 General Election Information which includes important deadlines, plus, contact information for inquiries.
[Read more](https://sansabatexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/10/2026-General-Election-Information.pdf)

….

[General Election 5-03-25 Unofficial Election Results](https://sansabatexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/05/Unofficial-Results-General-Election-5-03-25.pdf)
[San Saba ISD Trustee/Bond Early Voting Roster](https://sansabatexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/05/Early-Voting-Roster.pdf)

**Special Announcement Regarding the May 3rd General Election:**

***Early Voting electing two (2) School Board Trustees for San Saba ISD and the San Saba ISD Bond Election will be held in the City Council Chambers located at 303 South Clear Street, San Saba, Texas. Election Day (May 3rd) will be held at the same location.***

***Early Voting begins on April 22nd through April 25th, 8:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. and April 28th through April 29th, 8:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. Election Day, May 3rd, 2025, 7:00 a.m. to 7:00 p.m.***

***City of San Saba General Election was cancelled.***

Notice of Voter Order Priority for voters with certain disabilities hereby states an election officer shall give voting order priority to individuals with a mobility problem that substantially impairs the person’s ability to move around.
[Read more](https://sansabatexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/04/Voting-Order-Priority-for-Voters-Disababilities.pdf)

….

Notice of Election Cancellation that the City of San Saba hereby cancels the election scheduled to be held on May 3, 2025 in accordance of Section 2.035 of the Texas Election Code.
[Read more](https://sansabatexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/04/Order-Election-Cancellation.pdf)
….

Notice of Deadline to File Application for Place on the Ballot for the May 3, 2025, City of San Saba General Election Ballot. End Date to file is Friday, February 14, 2025. (Aviso de Fecha Limite Para Presentar una Solicitud Para un Lugar en la Boleta).
[Read more ….](https://sansabatexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/Notice-of-Election-Deadline-2025.pdf)

Notice of Joint Election Agreement. This agreement is entered into between the City of San Saba acting herein by and through its City Council and the San Saba Independent School District acting by and through its Board of Trustees for the purposes of conducing joint elections for members of the respective governing bodies.
[Read more ….](https://sansabatexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/joint-election-agreement-2025.pdf)

Notice of Internet Posting Requirement for Political Subdivisions.
[Read More ….](https://sansabatexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/03/2025-PostingHB305INTERNETPO.pdf)

Friday: 7:30am – 11:30am
